xtc.lang.cpp

Class Syntax

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtc.tree.Node
      • xtc.tree.Token
        • xtc.lang.cpp.Syntax
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Object>, Locatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Syntax.Conditional, Syntax.ConditionalBlock, Syntax.Directive, Syntax.EOF, Syntax.Language, Syntax.Layout

    public abstract class Syntax
extends Token
    Support for syntax objects. This class is not yet used. Each syntax object supports a number of flags, efficiently implemented through a bit mask. Their main usage is by the preprocessor to control macro expansion.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.28 $

      The kinds of syntax objects.

      A language token.
      static interface  Syntax.LanguageTag
      The interface for language tags.
      static class  Syntax.Layout
      Layout.
      static class  Syntax.PreprocessorTag 
      static class  Syntax.Text<Tag extends Enum<Tag> & Syntax.LanguageTag>
      A language token with variable text, such as identifiers and literals.
